titleStmt.title: Prologue to a new play called Venice preserv'd, or, The plot discovered at the Duke's Theatre, spoken by Mr. Smith.
titleStmt.author: Otway, Thomas, 1652-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Also: Epilogue to the same spoken by Mr. Betterton.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
